title: Ticket #5200: Resolve race condition in unit_test_sinful.
description: After we wait for the shared port daemon to register with the CCB broker, we do a condor_reconfig and wait for another line in the log to appear indicating that the address file is ready to read. The line in the log is actually noting that it's /about/ to update the address file, and this occasionally causes us to test SP without CCB instead of with. This should be changed to check the address file for changes directly.
